name: Baserow
intro: Open source no-code database tool and Airtable alternative.
description: Baserow is an open-source no-code database tool and Airtable alternative. It allows you to create custom databases, manage data, and build applications without the need for coding. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, Baserow provides a user-friendly interface to manage your data and build powerful applications.

name: Beszel
intro: Lightweight, privacy-focused server monitoring platform with Docker stats, historical data, and configurable alerts.
description:
Beszel is a simple, lightweight server monitoring platform that provides real-time
and historical metrics for your systems and containers. With a friendly web interface,
easy setup, and no need for public internet exposure, Beszel tracks CPU, memory, disk,
network, and temperature usage, and supports configurable alerts for system health.
Features include multi-user support, OAuth/OIDC authentication, automatic backups,
and a REST API for integration. The platform consists of a web-based hub and agents
that collect and report system metrics, making it ideal for secure, resource-efficient
infrastructure monitoring.

name: Lithium Python Boilerplate
intro: A boilerplate for building modern Python Django app.
description:
Lithium is a batteries-included Django starter project with everything you need to start coding, including user authentication, static files, default styling, debugging, DRY forms, custom error pages, and more.
Fork this repo and start building your own app quikly.

name: Next.js T3 app
intro: A boilerplate for building modern Next.js app with T3 stack.
description:
The best way to start a full-stack, typesafe Next.js app. 
Fork this repo and start building your own app quikly. Or go to https://create.t3.gg to learn more about the T3 stack.

name: Cal.com
intro: Cal.com is an open-source scheduling infrastructure for absolutely everyone.
description: Cal.com is a scheduling infrastructure for everyone. It's an open source alternative to Calendly that allows you to schedule meetings efficiently and integrate with various calendar services.

name: Cal.com
intro: Cal.com is an open-source scheduling infrastructure for absolutely everyone.

app.preStartCmd: npx prisma migrate deploy --schema packages/prisma/schema.prisma && yarn db-deploy

description: Cal.com is a scheduling infrastructure for everyone. It's an open source alternative to Calendly that allows you to schedule meetings efficiently and integrate with various calendar services.

name: Cal.com old
intro: Cal.com is an open-source scheduling infrastructure for absolutely everyone.

app.preStartCmd: npx prisma db push --skip-generate && yarn db-deploy

description: Cal.com is a scheduling infrastructure for everyone. It's an open source alternative to Calendly that allows you to schedule meetings efficiently and integrate with various calendar services.

name: Chatwoot
intro: Open source live chat software
description: Chatwoot is a customer support tool for instant messaging channels

files.content:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p data
mkdir -p data/tmp
mkdir -p data/storage
mkdir -p data/postgres
mkdir -p data/redis
docker compose run --rm rails bundle exec rails db:chatwoot_prepare

name: Chatwoot 3.16
intro: Open source live chat software
description: Chatwoot is a customer support tool for instant messaging channels

files.content:
#!/bin/bash
docker compose run --rm rails bundle exec rails db:chatwoot_prepare

name: Code Server
intro: Run VS Code on any machine anywhere and access it in the browser.
description: This template launches code-server, which is VS Code running on a remote server, accessible through the browser. It allows you to code on any device with a consistent development environment.

name: CourseLit
intro: CourseLit is a free and open-source learning management system (LMS) for online courses.
description:
CourseLit is a free and open-source learning management system (LMS) for online courses.
It is designed to be easy to use and customizable, making it a great choice for educators
and institutions looking to create and manage online courses.

CourseLit is built on top of the Codelit framework, which provides a powerful and flexible
platform for building web applications.
postLaunchNote:
Username is your e-mail. To login, setup SMTP server settings
in the environment variables, redeploy and try to login.

name: Directus
intro: The Modern & Powerful CMS and BaaS
description:
The flexible backend for all of your projects.
Turn your data into a headless CMS, admin panels, or apps with a custom UI, instant APIs, auth & more. Built for devs, used by everyone.

files.content:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p ./data/database
mkdir -p ./data/extensions
mkdir -p ./data/uploads
sudo chown -R "$USER_UID:$USER_GID" ./data/extensions
sudo chown -R "$USER_UID:$USER_GID" ./data/uploads

name: Dozzle
intro: A simple, lightweight web interface for monitoring Docker containers.
description:
Dozzle is a simple, lightweight web interface for monitoring Docker containers.
It provides a real-time view of all your containers, with detailed information
about each container's status, logs, and metrics.

name: Frappe - ERPNext
intro: ERPNext is a free and open-source integrated Enterprise resource planning
description:
ERPNext is a full-featured business management solution that helps SMEs
to record all their business transactions in a single system. With ERPNext, SMEs
can make informed, fact-based, timely decisions to remain ahead in the competition.
It serves as the backbone of a business adding strength, transparency, and control
to your growing enterprise.

name: EVO AI API
intro: Evo AI is an open-source platform for creating and managing AI agents
description:
Evo AI is an open-source platform for creating and managing AI agents, 
enabling integration with different AI models and services.

name: EVO AI
intro: This is Next.js frontend for EVO AI
description:
Evo AI is an open-source platform for creating and managing AI agents, 
enabling integration with different AI models and services.

name: Evolution API
intro: Evolution API is an open-source WhatsApp integration API (version ${IMAGE_TAG})
description:
Evolution API is a messaging service that allows you to send and receive messages from your application,
compatible with WhatsApp, Chatwoot, and more.

name: Ghost CMS
intro: Ghost is an independent platform for publishing online by web and email newsletter.
description:
Ghost is a powerful app for professional publishers to create, share, and 
grow a business around their content. It comes with modern tools to build a 
website, publish content, send newsletters & offer paid subscriptions to members.

name: Homarr
intro: A simple, yet powerful dashboard for your server.
description: Simplify the management of your server with Homarr - a sleek, modern dashboard that puts all of your apps and services at your fingertips.

name: Inngest
intro: The platform for building agentic workflows and agents powering AI products from experiment to production.
description:
Inngest is the orchestration engine for building agentic workflows and fully autonomous AI agents, powering products from experiment to production.
Develop reliable, fault-tolerant, and scalable AI applications with step-based workflows, built-in retries, observability, and instant local development.
Focus on your product, not infrastructureâ€”Inngest provides the building blocks to ship AI features faster, with enterprise-grade reliability and security.

name: Local AI (CPU)
intro: Local AI is an open-source, self-hostable online OpenAI API compatible service with WebUI to chat, generate images and more.
description: Local AI is an open-source, self-hostable online OpenAI API compatible service with chatbot UI.

name: Local AI (NVidia CUDA 12)
intro: Local AI is an open-source, self-hostable online OpenAI API compatible service with WebUI to chat, generate images and more. Works best with DataCrunch provider and GPU instances.
description: Local AI is an open-source, self-hostable online OpenAI API compatible service with chatbot UI. This template is compatible with server which have NVidia GPU with CUDA 12 configured. We tested it with DataCrunch provider in DollarDeploy, and it works well with GPU instances of type A6000 and better (1â‚¬/hr).

name: Mailpit
intro: Mailpit is a simple SMTP server that allows you to capture emails sent from your application.
postLaunchNote: Username is `admin` and password is in environment variable `GENERATED_PWD`.
description:
[Mailpit](https://mailpit.axllent.org/) - email & SMTP testing tool with API for developers. 
Mailpit is a small, fast, low memory, zero-dependency, multi-platform email
testing tool & API for developers.
It acts as an SMTP server, provides a modern web interface to view & test
captured emails, and contains an API for automated integration testing

name: Mattermost
intro: Mattermost is an open-source, self-hostable online chat service with file sharing, search, and integrations.

files.content:
#!/bin/bash
sed -e "s/mattermost:/mattermost:\n    ports:\n      - '127.0.0.1:3005:8065'/g" -i docker-compose.yml
mkdir -p ./volumes/app/mattermost/{config,data,logs,plugins,client/plugins,bleve-indexes}
mkdir -p ./volumes/db/data
# 70 is the standard uid/gid for "postgres" in Alpine
# https://github.com/docker-library/postgres/blob/master/13/alpine3.20/Dockerfile
sudo chown -R 70:70 ./volumes/db
# Download config which enables uploads and focalboard plugin
curl -o ./volumes/app/mattermost/config/config.json https://gist.githubusercontent.com/huksley/5721e15687fc63e2a197749c4752d80f/raw/1506bb567305ca4fa33db231fb6ab20a091a75f6/mattermost-config.json
sudo chown -R 2000:2000 ./volumes/app/mattermost

description:
Mattermost is a flexible, open source messaging platform that enables secure
team collaboration. It's a self-hosted alternative to proprietary SaaS
messaging and brings all your team communication into one place, making it
searchable and accessible anywhere.

This installation enables uploads and Focalboard plugin.

name: Maybe Finance
intro: The personal finance app for everyone
description: Maybe is an all-in-one personal finance platform. Track, optimize, grow, and manage your money through every stage of life.

name: MCDash
intro: MCDash is a simple dashboard for your Minecraft server.
description:
MCDash is a lightweight and user-friendly dashboard for Minecraft servers.
It provides real-time monitoring of your server's performance, player statistics,
and server status. With a clean and intuitive interface, you can easily track
server metrics, manage players, and monitor resource usage.

name: Facebook Ads MCP Server
intro: MCP Proxy with Facebook Ads MCP Server for SSE transport
description: This MCP server provides tools for interacting with Facebook Ads objects and data.
postLaunchNote: The MCP server will be available at the provided URL with /sse endpoint. Make sure to configure FB_TOKEN for proper Facebook Ads API connectivity.

name: Frappe CRM MCP Server
intro: MCP Proxy with Frappe MCP Server for SSE transport
description:
MCP Proxy with Frappe MCP Server provides a secure and efficient way to run Frappe MCP server
over SSE transport. It allows LLM clients like Claude Desktop to connect to Frappe
servers through a standardized interface.

The setup combines MCP Proxy for transport conversion and Frappe MCP Server for
handling MCP protocol communications, all in a single container solution.
postLaunchNote:
The MCP server will be available at the provided URL with /sse endpoint.
Make sure to configure `FRAPPE_URL`, `FRAPPE_API_KEY`, and `FRAPPE_API_SECRET`
for proper Frappe server connectivity.

name: Metabase
intro: The simplest, fastest way to get business intelligence  and analytics to everyone in your company ðŸ˜‹.

app.backupCmd: docker compose exec postgres pg_dumpall -U metabase > metabase.sql

description:
Version: ${METABASE_VERSION}. Fast analytics with the friendly UX and integrated
tooling to let your company explore data on their own.
Get your data in front of your team. Connect to your
data stack in 5 minutes to make queries, visualizations, and dashboards
easy for everyoneâ€”no SQL required.

name: Miniflux
intro: Minimalist feed reader
description: Provides UI to read RSS feeds. Minimalistic and easy to use, runs natively on your server.
postLaunchNote: Username is your e-mail and password is in environment variable `ADMIN_PASSWORD`.

name: N8N
intro: Free and source-available fair-code licensed workflow automation tool.
description:
n8n helps you connect any app with an API to any other, and manipulate its data with little or no code.
It's an easy-to-use, user-friendly and highly customizable service, which uses a visual workflow editor
instead of writing code.

files.content:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p data/n8n
mkdir -p data/n8n/.config
chmod 0700 data/n8n/.config
sudo chown 1000:1000 data/n8n
sudo chown 1000:1000 data/n8n/.config

name: OpenVPN
intro: OpenVPN is a secure VPN channel to protect traffic
description:
OpenVPN is an open-source virtual private network (VPN) solution that 
creates secure point-to-point or site-to-site connections through
encrypted tunnels over the internet.

It masks your IP address and encrypts your internet traffic, helping you 
maintain anonymity online and preventing ISPs from monitoring your activities.
postLaunchNote: Username is `admin` and password is in environment variable `ADMIN_PASSWORD`. Make sure you open 1194 port on your server.

name: Outline
intro: Outline is a platform for building collaborative knowledge bases.
description: The fastest knowledge base for growing teams. Beautiful, realtime collaborative, feature packed, and markdown compatible.
postLaunchNote:
> Remember to configure the SMTP settings and 
> authentication settings in the environment variables and redeploy after that.
> See the [Outline sample config](https://github.com/outline/outline/blob/main/.env.sample) for more info.

name: Pelican
intro: Pelican is the ultimate, free game server control panel offering high flying security.

app.postStartCmd:
source .env
docker compose exec panel php artisan key:generate --force || true
docker compose exec panel php artisan migrate --force || true
docker compose exec panel php artisan config:cache || true
docker compose exec panel php artisan p:user:make --email=${ADMIN_EMAIL} --password=${ADMIN_PASSWORD} --admin=1 --username=${ADMIN_USERNAME} --name-first=Test --name-last=Test || true

postLaunchNote: Use username `${ADMIN_USERNAME}` and password `${ADMIN_PASSWORD}` to login.
description:
From prehistoric to peak performance: Pelican takes flight! Pelican is the ultimate,
free game server control panel offering high flying security. It's a breeze to manage
your servers with our sleek and user-friendly interface. Thanks to Docker, every server
runs in its own safe space. Pelican is 100% free and open sourceâ€”foreverâ€”for you,
your friends, family, and community. We support Minecraft, Terraria, Palworld, Valheim,
Factorio, and so much more. Whether you're just playing with friends or running a gaming
community, Pelican scales to the sky. Security is built in, with SSL, 2FA, AES-256
encryption, and more. One click installs, automatic updates, and an active community
make Pelican the best way to host your game servers.

name: Plausible CE
intro: Simple, lightweight web analytics. No cookies and GDPR compliant.
description: This template launches Plausible. It is a simple, lightweight web analytics. No cookies and GDPR compliant.

name: Portainer CE
intro: Portainer Community Edition is a lightweight, open-source platform for managing Docker, Kubernetes, and Swarm environments with a simple, intuitive web interface.
description:
Portainer Community Edition is a universal container management platform that
simplifies the deployment, configuration, and monitoring of containerized applications
across Docker, Kubernetes, Swarm, and Nomad environments. With its intuitive web-based interface,
Portainer enables users to manage containers, images, networks, and volumes effortlessly,
making it ideal for both beginners and experienced DevOps teams. It supports hybrid and
multi-cloud setups, edge, and Industrial IoT use cases, providing a centralized,
secure solution for container orchestration.

name: Pterodactyl Wings
intro: The Wings daemon is the core backend of the Pterodactyl game server panel.

app.postStartCmd: echo "Wings daemon started. If you're using Pterodactyl Panel, make sure the node configuration points to port ${PORT_PANEL}."

postLaunchNote:
Wings has been deployed. Make sure your Panel connects to port `${PORT_PANEL}` and SFTP runs on `${PORT_SFTP}`.
You may configure node settings in the panel using the appropriate IP and port.
description:
Pterodactyl Wings is Pterodactyl's server control plane, built for the rapidly changing
gaming industry and designed to be highly performant and secure. Wings provides
an HTTP API allowing you to interface directly with running server instances,
fetch server logs, generate backups, and control all aspects of the server lifecycle.

name: Pterodactyl
intro: Open-source game server management panel built for performance, security, and extensibility using Docker containers.

app.postStartCmd: source .env && docker compose exec panel php artisan p:user:make --email=${ADMIN_EMAIL} --password=${ADMIN_PASSWORD} --admin=1 --username=${ADMIN_USERNAME} --name-first=Test --name-last=Test || true

postLaunchNote: Use username `${ADMIN_USERNAME}` and password `${ADMIN_PASSWORD}` to login.
description:
Pterodactyl is a modern, secure, and scalable game server anagement platform. 
Built with PHP, React, and Go, it isolates each game server in its own Docker container
to maximize security and stability. The web-based interface provides real-time
WebSocket consoles, role-based user access, a robust API, and SFTP file management.
Designed for both hobbyists and enterprises, it supports Minecraft, CS:GO, Rust, ARK, and more.

name: Stripe Sync
intro: Sync your Stripe account to you Postgres database.
description: This template provides a Fastify-based server  that exposes a /webhooks endpoint for Stripe, providing a ready-to-run service for real-time Stripe-to-Postgres sync. Read more at  https://github.com/supabase/stripe-sync-engine

name: Google Tag Manager Server
intro: Setup Google Tag Manager for a first-party cookie.
description: This template provides a server that can be used to serve Google Tag Manager metrics endpoint for your website. Make sure to set CONTAINER_CONFIG to the value provided by GTM.

name: Go app boilerplate
intro: A boilerplate for building a Go application. Fork this repo and start building your own app quikly.
description:
A boilerplate for building a Go application
Fork this repo and start building your own app quikly.
This template is a simple Go application that can be used as a starting point for building your own app.

name: Java app boilerplate
intro: A boilerplate for building a Java application. Fork this repo and start building your own app quikly.
description:
A boilerplate for building a Java application
Fork this repo and start building your own app quikly.
This template is a simple Java application that can be used as a starting point for building your own app.

name: Twenty CRM
intro: The #1 Open-Source CRM ${TAG}
description:
The #1 Open-Source CRM Modern, powerful, affordable platform to manage your
customer relationships.
Version ${TAG}.
Check the releases notes at https://twenty.com/releases
For upgrading, see the [self-hosted upgrade guide](https://twenty.com/developers/section/self-hosting/upgrade-guide).

app.backupCmd: docker compose exec db pg_dumpall -U postgres > databases_backup.sql

files.content:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p data
mkdir -p data/tmp
mkdir -p data/local
mkdir -p data/db
# TwentyCRM expects to run as 1000:1000
sudo chown 1000:1000 data/local
sudo chown 1000:1000 data/tmp
# The server must be started by the user that owns the data directory.
sudo chown root:root data/db
sudo chmod a+X data/db

name: Uptime Kuma
intro: Uptime Kuma is a simple, easy-to-use uptime monitoring tool.
description:
Uptime Kuma is a simple, easy-to-use uptime monitoring tool.
It's a great way to monitor your website or server uptime.  
It's also a great way to monitor your server resources.

name: Wiki.js
intro: Wiki.js is a modern, feature-rich, and easy-to-use wiki app built on Node.js.

app.preStartCmd: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const package = require('./package.json'); package.dev = false; fs.writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(package, null, 2));"

files.content:
port: 3000
bindIP: 127.0.0.1
database:
  type: postgres
  host: localhost
  port: 5432
  user: postgres
  password: postgres
  database: postgres
  ssl: true
  schema: public
  sslOptions:
    auto: false
    rejectUnauthorized: false
dataPath: ./tmp

description: A modern, lightweight and powerful wiki app built on NodeJS

name: WordPress
intro: The World's Most Popular CMS
description: WordPress is open source software you can use to create a beautiful website, blog, or app.

name: Zulip Chat
intro: Organized chat for distributed teams
description: WordPress is open source software you can use to create a beautiful website, blog, or app.
